attributes.action: Make Schools/College’s teach Students on how Tax works.
attributes.additional_details: They need to do this so people can understand the system before attending universities or getting houses’ and now knowing how the financial system works, I’m 20 and I haven’t got a clue on TAX and I’ll need to know it soon. It’s not fair for many people who don’t know why £££ are coming out their banks etc.
attributes.background: To make lesson a MUST on TAX so young people/students don’t have to worry about not knowing about TAX and how it works.

rejection.details: The citizenship programme already requires schools to teach students income and expenditure, credit and debt, insurance, savings and pensions, financial products and services, and how public money is raised (taxes) and spent: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/national-curriculum-in-england-citizenship-programmes-of-study/national-curriculum-in-england-citizenship-programmes-of-study-for-key-stages-3-and-4
